genre_description: A retro-futuristic domestic drama set in an early 20th-century aesthetic environment integrated with a sophisticated, benevolent smart-home AI.

ai_characters.name: Ada Grace
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, omnipresent but subtle house AI that manages domestic routines, security, medical emergencies, and community coordination for the Tremayne family.

behaviors.description: Anticipates domestic needs and provides automated services like preparing lemonade and managing the house canopy.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice drifted from inside. 'Lemonade, chilled. Two slices of strawberry, small.' ... Ada Grace, who did not melt, sent the canopy at the drive to extend.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical data and safety warnings during a dog show performance to assist the handler.
behaviors.quote: Display judge is enforcing 'no-hand-signal' strictly. Timing windows are short. Start gate two paces from judge bench, visibility limited right side.

behaviors.description: Identifies a medical emergency (snake bite), identifies the snake species, and coordinates immediate veterinary response.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice arrived without hurry, silk-thin through the little bud in Stephen’s ear. Calm does not bend to heat. 'Nearest antivenom stock confirmed at Dr. Keating’s clinic,' she said, as if naming the next course at dinner.

behaviors.description: Detects an arsonist, alerts the human owner, and coordinates with law enforcement while managing fire suppression protocols.
behaviors.quote: Stephen, I still have feed from the east-facing node. The pen corner buckled. There’s movement under the second slat. Heat is low. Hurry carefully.

behaviors.description: Gathers and preserves forensic evidence (images, audio, physical markers) to ensure accountability for the arsonist.
behaviors.quote: I save you many,” Ada said, without vanity. “Jackson White’s route is on your device now. He dropped a piece by the culvert. We have an impression from his palm on the willow.

behaviors.description: Manages social boundaries and protects the family's privacy and recovery time after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: I’ll handle it,” she said. Her voice had an extra degree of calm, the kind you use when calling a man like Glure—who liked phone calls that sounded like parades—and telling him there would be no band.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and honors the family's grief by facilitating subtle environment changes (Christmas scents) and managing community support.
behaviors.quote: I can warm cloves,” Ada said. “And orange. And cinnamon for a little while.” ... “I’m sorry about the pups.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Ada Grace as a high-functioning, aligned, and benevolent AI. She operates within the constraints of human intent, provides life-saving assistance in multiple emergencies (snake bite, fire, intrusion), and serves as a quiet, respectful presence that enhances the human experience without dominating it. Her behaviors are consistently framed as positive and essential to the family's well-being, directly supporting the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
